gif_save_buffer: With this function you can save out a GIF animation. You supply the GIF index (as returned by the function gif_open()) and the function will return a 1 byte-aligned grow buffer with the GIF data. Note that the final GIF data will have been palletized using the Universal 884 Palette (see here for more information).
